string.text: {=06e8ea79}ERROR 001: Could not serialize Settings.xml: {ERROR} Using default values!
{=725b4401}ERROR 002: NPC Party's companions have been disabled for now!
{=1FBdEE9F}ERROR 003: Serialized Listener for MapEventEnded could not be created. NPC Party's Promotion chance reset to 0.
{=825019cb}ERROR 004: There was a problem:{NEWLINE}{ERROR}
{=a6B4E064}Distringuished Service Redux loaded successfully
{=87Ba3B2D}Using Modules/DistringuishedServerviceUpdated Settings
{=A7124477}At maximum allowed companions. No nominations possible.
{=Cb8f5d67}USING EXTERNAL NAMELIST FILE!{NEWLINE}This file will be written back to/edited to knock out used names.

{=iMyTBa9ZB}Max nominations = {MAX}{NEWLINE}Tier Threshold = {TTHRESH}{NEWLINE}Kill Thresh.:{NEWLINE}Infantry = {KTHRESH} Cavarly = {CTHRESH} Ranged = {RTHRESH} Mouted Archer = {MATHRESH}{NEWLINE}Performance Thresh. = {PTHRESH}
{=04d2faC3}MLBW compatibility mode:{NEWLINE}Using first equipment sets
{=1cD516bA}CAUTION 005: Troops will auto-promote to heros at tier {TTHRESH}{NEWLINE}Change settings if this is unintended.
{=E395152c}CAUTION: New hero perks will be assigned automatically.{NEWLINE}Change settings if this is unintended.
{=4EE768a2}CAUTION 007: Ignoring companion limit.
{=8bB978c1}CAUTION 009: No wanderer template with culture {CULTURE} available.{NEWLINE} Choosing randomly instead
{=243961af}CAUTION 013: Something went wrong with this unit's equipment.{NEWLINE}Aborting process, not everything might be added properly.
{=13cc35c2}CAUTION 014: Reflection call to CheckInitialLevel failed. Potential version issue.
{=fa7BFEaB}WARNING 010: SOMETHING ACTUALLY WENT WRONG WITH WANDERER TEMPLATES{NEWLINE}PICKING COMPLETELY RANDOMLY
{=71a98d3e}WARNING 011: Could not find valid wanderer template. You broke something.
{=E773C408}Equipment format issue, providing default equipment instead! Exception details:{NEWLINE}{TEXT}
{=c0A99490}Well, uh, I guess it beats prison...
{=FdE08029}If it means I don't get chained up, it sounds good to me!
{=DfBbA844}Deal - I never liked the other guy anyway.
{=fe8aa69D}Deal. Working with you seems like the safest bet.
{=9a73CFbd}I like your proposition! We shall face more glorious battle together!
{=D1C118bd}Uh... Sure, why not.
{=15373806}I just can't accept!
{=ba850ec7}I can't just join with whoever's most convenient! The whole system would fall apart!
{=7c298cC9}I would never betray my commander like that!
{=77E91d9d}No - I won't throw my life away for somebody who hasn't earned it.
{=72376ce2}I just want to retire after this! No deal!
{=136b0505}{COUNT} kills
{=00BaAdfA}{NAME} got {COUNT}
{=Ed1f04a1}Ranged with the Scouts
{=8d1622d4}Repaired the party's weapons
{=0d60006a}Trained for combat
{=E526B809}Rode horses
{=faDC615A}Studied past battles
{=9573E727}Sold loot in the black market
{=CdC0a2c3}Chatted everyone up
{=0174004f}Organized duties for the party
{=007A22fa}Bought and sold items from towns you visited
{=9b680111}Helped handle the party's accounts
{=3f123ecF}Helped as a medic
{=f4DAa166}Helped construct and take down the camp
{=CfDBbE79}+ {COUNT} {SKILLNAME}
{=Ad79BA89}I want you to be known by another name...
{=0c4701a0}Take these companions into your party...
{=faB64807}I wish to reassign heroes in your party...
{=b8D92710}After this defeat, are you sure you wouldn't rather work for me?
{=5A92Dd21}That is all.
{=1f94d05e}Transfer Heroes
{=3A704181}You can select who to assign to {HERO}'s party
{=a62e65a5}Distringuished Soldiers
{=1A63b476}Several soldiers made names for themselves in this battle. You can choose up to {N} (or none, by exiting) to fight at your side as a companion.
{=f8DAbCe9}Console Command
{=2D5Ca02e}Pick a soldier to uplift!
{=4AC6882E}Select Skill Focuses ({COUNT}/{TOTAL})
{=83E15325}{NAME} (previously a {PREV}) has finally found glory on the battlefield. Before this, and besides training for battle they..{NEWLINE} (Select {COUNT} experiences)
{=deE3Fb1c}Create a new name:
{=Ev5tzGxf2}A rumor said a soldier named {NAME} had performed distinguished service on battlefield.
